knimeNode.name: HDF5 Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads dataSets and attributes from an HDF5 File.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads dataSets and attributes from an HDF5 File. The path from the root of the file to the dataSets and attributes will be contained in the output.

tab.name: File Chooser
tab.option:
Select the path to the input file.
Supported formats are:
.h5

Options are:
Allow missing values: Specifies if null/missing values are allowed or not. Null/missing values are the result of merging two dataSets with a different number of rows.

fullDescription.tab:
Specifies the included and excluded dataSets of the file. So this is the content of the output table.
The usage is based on the Column Filter:
This list contains the paths of the dataSets that are included in the output table.
Select this option to enforce the current inclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the included dataSets are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New dataSets will automatically be added to the exclusion list.)
Use these buttons to move dataSets between the Include and Exclude list.
Use one of these fields to search either within the Include or Exclude list for certain dataSets paths or its substrings. Repeated clicking of the search button marks the next dataSet that matches the search text. The check box 'Mark all search hits' causes all matching dataSets to be selected making them movable between the two lists.
This list contains the paths of the dataSets of the file that are excluded at the output table.
Select this option to enforce the current exclusion list to stay the same even if the input specification changes. If some of the excluded dataSets are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New dataSets will automatically be added to the inclusion list.)

Specifies the included and excluded attributes of the file. So these are converted to the flow variables of the output.
Usage is the same as for the DataSet Selector.

ports.outPort: All included dataSets merged together by columns.
